root.name: Star Trek: Starfleet Command: Orion Pirates
root.description: Star Trek: Starfleet Command: Orion Pirates is a stand alone expansion to Star Trek: Starfleet Command Volune II: Empires At War that puts players in charge of one of eight separate pirate cartels that make up the titular Orion Pirates.

similar_games.game: Star Trek: Starfleet Command Volume II - Empires at War
